mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId, today_transport AS todayTransport, today_robbery AS todayRobbery, current_grade_id AS currentGradeId, refresh_tokens AS refreshTokens, last_reset_date AS lastResetDate, update_time AS updateTime FROM supply_data WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO supply_data (user_id, today_transport, today_robbery, current_grade_id, refresh_tokens, last_reset_date, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{todayTransport}, #{todayRobbery}, #{currentGradeId}, #{refreshTokens}, #{lastResetDate}, #{updateTime}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE today_transport = #{todayTransport}, today_robbery = #{todayRobbery}, current_grade_id = #{currentGradeId}, refresh_tokens = #{refreshTokens}, last_reset_date = #{lastResetDate}, update_time = #{updateTime}
